sqlReaderQuery.value:
SELECT 
SOURCE_SYSTEM_CD ,
LOC ,
MODEL_NAME ,
MODEL_TYP ,
KGF_STD_ITEM_CD ,
INVTY_CTGY_TYP ,
LINE_NAME ,
convert(varchar,cast(START_DT as date),23) START_DT,
convert(varchar,cast(START_TM as time),8) START_TM,
LOC_TYP ,
SUB_LOC ,
convert(varchar,cast(PUBLISH_DT as date),23) PUBLISH_DT,
convert(varchar,cast(PUBLISH_TM as time),8) PUBLISH_TM,
SCHEDULER_NAME ,
convert(varchar,cast(APPLICATION_TS as datetime),20) APPLICATION_TS ,
OVERRIDER_NAME ,
SCHEDULE_QTY ,
OVERRIDE_QTY ,
UOM_CD ,
convert(varchar,cast(END_DT as date),23) END_DT,
convert(varchar,cast(END_TM as time),8) END_TM,
OVERRIDE_IND ,
convert(varchar,cast(OVERRIDE_TS as datetime),20) OVERRIDE_TS,
PRISM_PM_NAME ,
PRISM_PM_TYP ,
PRISM_OVRD_PCT ,
DELETE_FL ,
MAINT_USERID ,
convert(varchar,cast(MAINT_TS as datetime),21) MAINT_TS,
POSTED_SCHEDULE 
FROM [#DSNA].RP_PSCH_DETAIL
WHERE LOC = 8329
AND PUBLISH_DT > '2017'
AND SOURCE_SYSTEM_CD = 'SCHEDX'
ORDER BY START_DT,
 KGF_STD_ITEM_CD
